Features.title: Quality
Features.text: We use 15+ sourcing channels to source quality resumes.

Features.title: Speed
Features.text: You can expect the first batch of resumes within 3 - 4 days.

Features.title: Time Saving
Features.text: All resumes received will be pre-screened to save your screening time.

Features.title: Assurance
Features.text: Model is completely postpaid, with 30 days refund/replacement clause to safeguard your interests.

vacancies.title: Full Stack Developer
vacancies.description: We are looking for a Full Stack Developer with experience in React and Node.js. Responsibilities include developing front-end website architecture, designing user interactions, and ensuring responsiveness of applications.
responsibilities: Developing front-end website architecture.
Designing user interactions on web pages.
Ensuring responsiveness of applications.
Working alongside graphic designers for web design features.
Seeing through a project from conception to finished product.
Designing and developing APIs.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Full Stack Developer.
Experience with React and Node.js.
Experience with database technologies such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.
Experience with web application architecture.
Experience with cloud technologies such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
Experience with RESTful APIs.
Experience with version control tools such as Git.
Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Experience with server-side languages such as Python, Ruby, Java, or PHP.
benefits: Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies.
Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Backend Developer
vacancies.description: Join our team as a Backend Developer with expertise in Java and Spring Boot. You will be responsible for server-side web application logic and integration of the work front-end developers do.
responsibilities: Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code.
Designing and implementing low-latency, high-availability, and performant applications.
Integrating user-facing elements developed by front-end developers with server-side logic.
Implementing security and data protection.
Integrating data storage solutions.
Creating database schemas that represent and support business processes.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Backend Developer.
Experience with Java and Spring Boot.
Experience with database technologies such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.
Experience with RESTful APIs.
Experience with version control tools such as Git.
Experience with cloud technologies such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
Experience with server-side languages such as Python, Ruby, Java, or PHP.
benefits: Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies.
Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Dev ops Engineer
vacancies.description: We are looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for managing the deployment and operation of our systems, ensuring high availability and performance.
responsibilities: Designing and implementing build, deployment, and configuration management.
Automating deployment of applications and services.
Monitoring and maintaining systems to ensure high availability and performance.
Troubleshooting and resolving issues in development, test, and production environments.
Collaborating with developers to make sure new environments meet requirements and conform to best practices.
Managing code repositories and version control systems.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a DevOps Engineer.
Experience with cloud technologies such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes.
Experience with configuration management tools such as Ansible, Puppet, or Chef.
Experience with monitoring tools such as Nagios, Prometheus, or Grafana.
Experience with version control tools such as Git.
Experience with scripting languages such as Bash, Python, or Ruby.
benefits: Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies.
Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Database Administrator
vacancies.description: As a Database Administrator, you will be responsible for maintaining and optimizing our database systems. You will ensure data integrity, security, and performance of our databases.
responsibilities: Installing and configuring database software and servers.
Monitoring database performance and optimizing database operations.
Ensuring data integrity and security.
Performing database backups and recovery.
Troubleshooting database issues and resolving database errors.
Collaborating with developers to optimize database queries and performance.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Database Administrator.
Experience with database technologies such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL.
Experience with database design and normalization.
Experience with database performance tuning and optimization.
Experience with database backup and recovery procedures.
Experience with database security best practices.
Experience with database monitoring and alerting tools.
Experience with version control tools such as Git.
benefits: Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies.
Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Security Engineer
vacancies.description: Join our team as a Security Engineer. You will be responsible for protecting our systems and networks from cyber threats, ensuring the security and privacy of our data and infrastructure.
responsibilities: Designing and implementing security measures to protect systems and networks.
Monitoring security vulnerabilities and threats.
Conducting security assessments and penetration testing.
Responding to security incidents and providing incident response.
Implementing security best practices and standards.
Collaborating with developers to secure applications and services.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Security Engineer.
Experience with security technologies such as firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and antivirus software.
Experience with security assessment tools such as Nessus, Metasploit, or Burp Suite.
Experience with security standards such as ISO 27001, NIST, or CIS.
Experience with security incident response and forensics.
Experience with cloud security best practices.
Experience with version control tools such as Git.
benefits: Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies.
Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: UI/UX Designer
vacancies.description: We are looking for a UI/UX Designer to join our team. You will be responsible for designing user interfaces and creating user experiences that meet our clients' needs and expectations.
responsibilities: Gathering and evaluating user requirements.
Illustrating design ideas using storyboards, process flows, and sitemaps.
Designing graphic user interface elements, like menus, tabs, and widgets.
Developing UI mockups and prototypes that clearly illustrate how sites function and look.
Creating original graphic designs (e.g., images, sketches, and tables).
Preparing and presenting rough drafts to internal teams and key stakeholders.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a UI/UX Designer.
Experience with design software such as Adobe XD, Sketch, or Figma.
Experience with wireframing and prototyping tools.
Experience with user research and usability testing.
Experience with responsive design and mobile-first design principles.
Experience with front-end technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Experience with version control tools such as Git.
benefits: Opportunity to work on cutting-edge technologies.
Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Sales Executive
vacancies.description: We are seeking a motivated Sales Executive to join our growing team. Your role will involve identifying new sales opportunities, building client relationships, and achieving sales targets.
responsibilities: Identifying new sales opportunities and generating leads.
Building client relationships and maintaining customer satisfaction.
Negotiating and closing sales deals.
Achieving sales targets and objectives.
Collaborating with the marketing team to develop sales strategies.
Providing feedback on market trends and customer needs.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Sales Executive.
Experience in B2B sales.
Experience in technology sales is a plus.
Proven track record of achieving sales targets.
Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
Strong customer service and relationship-building skills.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Account Manager
vacancies.description: As an Account Manager, you will manage client accounts, ensure client satisfaction, and help to grow our business by maintaining and developing client relationships.
responsibilities: Building and maintaining strong, long-lasting client relationships.
Negotiating contracts and agreements to maximize profit.
Developing trusted advisor relationships with key accounts.
Ensuring the timely and successful delivery of our solutions according to client needs and objectives.
Forecasting and tracking key account metrics.
Identifying and growing opportunities within accounts.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as an Account Manager.
Experience in B2B sales.
Experience in technology sales is a plus.
Proven track record of achieving sales targets.
Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
Strong customer service and relationship-building skills.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Marketing Coordinator
vacancies.description: We are looking for a Marketing Coordinator to assist with planning and executing marketing campaigns. You will work closely with the marketing team to develop content, coordinate events, and track campaign performance.
responsibilities: Assisting with the development and execution of marketing campaigns.
Creating and curating content for social media and other marketing channels.
Coordinating marketing events and trade shows.
Tracking and analyzing campaign performance.
Assisting with the development of marketing collateral.
Collaborating with the marketing team to develop marketing strategies.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Marketing Coordinator.
Experience in digital marketing and social media.
Experience with marketing automation tools.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Strong organizational and project management skills.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
vacancies.description: Join our team as a Digital Marketing Specialist. You will be responsible for managing our online presence, executing SEO strategies, and running PPC campaigns to increase our brand awareness and drive traffic.
responsibilities: Developing and implementing SEO strategies to increase website traffic.
Managing PPC campaigns to drive traffic and increase conversions.
Creating and curating content for social media and other online channels.
Analyzing and reporting on digital marketing performance.
Optimizing website content and user experience.
Collaborating with the marketing team to develop digital marketing strategies.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Digital Marketing Specialist.
Experience with SEO and PPC campaigns.
Experience with digital marketing tools such as Google Analytics, Google AdWords, and SEMrush.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Customer Support Representative
vacancies.description: We are hiring a Customer Support Representative to provide excellent service to our clients. Responsibilities include resolving customer issues, providing product information, and maintaining customer satisfaction.
responsibilities: Responding to customer inquiries and resolving issues.
Providing product information and troubleshooting assistance.
Maintaining customer records and updating account information.
Following up with customers to ensure their satisfaction.
Escalating unresolved issues to the appropriate department.
Identifying and implementing process improvements to enhance customer service.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Customer Support Representative.
Experience in a customer service role.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Technical Support Specialist
vacancies.description: As a Technical Support Specialist, you will assist customers with technical problems, guide them through solutions, and ensure technical issues are resolved promptly and effectively.
responsibilities: Providing technical support to customers via phone, email, or chat.
Diagnosing and troubleshooting technical issues.
Guiding customers through solutions and providing step-by-step instructions.
Escalating unresolved issues to the appropriate department.
Documenting technical support interactions and solutions.
Identifying and implementing process improvements to enhance technical support.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Technical Support Specialist.
Experience in a technical support role.
Strong technical knowledge of software, hardware, and systems.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Business Development Manager
vacancies.description: We are looking for a Business Development Manager to identify new business opportunities, build relationships with potential clients, and develop strategic partnerships to drive business growth.
responsibilities: Identifying new business opportunities and markets.
Building and maintaining relationships with clients and partners.
Developing and implementing sales strategies to achieve business objectives.
Negotiating and closing business deals.
Collaborating with the marketing team to develop marketing strategies.
Providing feedback on market trends and customer needs.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Business Development Manager.
Experience in B2B sales.
Proven track record of achieving sales targets.
Excellent communication and negotiation skills.
Strong customer service and relationship-building skills.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Business Analyst
vacancies.description: Join our team as a Business Analyst. You will analyze market trends, identify business opportunities, and provide insights to help shape our business strategy.
responsibilities: Analyzing market trends and identifying business opportunities.
Conducting market research and competitor analysis.
Developing business cases and financial models.
Providing insights and recommendations to support business decisions.
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to drive business growth.
Monitoring and reporting on business performance.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Business Analyst.
Experience in market research and analysis.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent communication and presentation skills.
Strong financial modeling skills.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: HR Manager
vacancies.description: We are seeking an HR Manager to oversee all aspects of human resources practices and processes. You will support business needs and ensure the proper implementation of company HR strategies.
responsibilities: Developing and implementing HR strategies and initiatives aligned with the overall business strategy.
Bridging management and employee relations by addressing demands, grievances, or other issues.
Managing the recruitment and selection process.
Supporting current and future business needs through the development, engagement, motivation, and preservation of human capital.
Developing and monitoring overall HR strategies, systems, tactics, and procedures across the organization.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as an HR Manager.
Experience in HR practices and processes.
Strong knowledge of labor legislation and HR best practices.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution skills.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

vacancies.title: Recruitment Specialist
vacancies.description: Join our team as a Recruitment Specialist. You will manage the recruitment process, including sourcing candidates, conducting interviews, and coordinating hiring processes to find the best talent.
responsibilities: Sourcing candidates through various channels.
Conducting interviews and screening candidates.
Coordinating hiring processes and onboarding new employees.
Developing and implementing recruitment strategies.
Maintaining candidate databases and tracking recruitment metrics.
Collaborating with hiring managers to identify staffing needs.
requirements: 3+ years of experience as a Recruitment Specialist.
Experience in recruitment and talent acquisition.
Strong knowledge of recruitment best practices.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Strong problem-solving and conflict resolution skills.
Self-motivated and results-oriented.
benefits: Opportunity for career growth and advancement.

buisness.title: Business strategy
buisness.description: Deﬁne, realize and orchestrate your North Star vision by intersecting business model and technology transformation to unlock enterprise agility.

buisness.title: Sustainability strategy
buisness.description: Our sustainability framework was developed to orient your business towards innovation and growth while amplifying social and cultural initiatives.

buisness.title: Process Automation & Design
buisness.description: By evaluating and restructuring the fundamentals of how data and work flows across your business we create opportunities for new value.

buisness.title: Data & Analytics
buisness.description: Data is the fuel for the modern enterprise. Unlock the value of enterprise data and build an insight-driven organization that delivers business advantage.

buisness.title: Hybrid Cloud Strategy
buisness.description: Accelerate your journey to hybrid cloud, driving cost efﬁciency, increased productivity, sustainability and faster time to market.

buisness.title: Operations
buisness.description: Experience-led co-creation that drives business value quickly, modernizes essential business processes, and helps you deploy enterprise-wide AI strategies.

augument.title: Talent acquisition and skills development
augument.description: Equip your workforce with the skills of the future. Transform your talent acquisition and skills strategies and processes with the right balance of people, AI and data.

augument.title: HR operations and outsourcing
augument.description: AI - first approach to modernize the HR function will enhance employee experience while reducing your operational cost whether you decide to outsource, or keep your services retained.

augument.title: Employee experience
augument.description: Deliver exceptional experiences to meet ever - evolving work-life employees need with data-driven insights and intelligent workflows.

augument.title: HR technology transformation
augument.description: Reinvent your HR function with employee-centric AI design, reduce HR operating costs through managed employee services that deliver state-of-the art, always on, consumer-like HR services to employees.

augument.title: HR digital transformation
augument.description: Transform HR and employee experiences using agile and design thinking methods, cognitive technologies and underpinned by HR systems, Oracle, Workday and SAP SuccessFactors.

consulting.title: Custom and data-managed services
consulting.description: Reduce your total cost of ownership and lower maintenance of applications and data, managing custom apps on cloud by leveraging capabilities in intelligent automation, self-healing, DevSecOps, platform engineering and SRE.

consulting.title: Enterprise application management services
consulting.description: Strategyz Consulting helps clients efficiently manage their enterprise applications with application services that leverage our proven capabilities in automation, mining, Finops and Garage, as well as our top-tier partnership status.

consulting.title: Platform services
consulting.description: Strategyz Consulting provides clients with specialized services for increased cybersecurity, efficiency and visibility such as DevSecOps, automation, quality engineering, platform engineering and service management.

vmsData.title: Vendor Registration and Onboarding
vmsData.description: Simplify the process of vendor registration and onboarding with automated workflows and standardized procedures.

vmsData.title: Contract Management
vmsData.description: Create, store, and manage vendor contracts, ensuring compliance and tracking key contract milestones and renewals.

vmsData.title: Performance Monitoring
vmsData.description: Evaluate vendor performance through metrics and KPIs, ensuring vendors meet your quality and service standards.

vmsData.title: Invoice and Payment Processing
vmsData.description: Automate the invoicing and payment process to reduce errors and ensure timely payments.

vmsData.title: Risk Management
vmsData.description: Identify and mitigate risks associated with vendor management by monitoring compliance and conducting regular audits.

vmsData.title: Improved Efficiency
vmsData.description: Streamline vendor management processes with automation and centralized data, reducing administrative overhead.

vmsData.title: Enhanced Visibility
vmsData.description: Gain real-time insights into vendor performance and compliance, enabling better decision-making.

vmsData.title: Cost Savings
vmsData.description: Optimize procurement processes and negotiate better rates with data-driven insights and performance tracking.

vmsData.title: Risk Reduction
vmsData.description: Ensure compliance and reduce risks associated with vendor relationships through robust monitoring and audit capabilities.

vmsData.title: Scalability
vmsData.description: Our VMS can scale with your organization, accommodating a growing vendor base and evolving business needs.
